main event: On November 6, 1968, witnesses in Acton, Texas observed two disc-shaped, silvery-white objects hovering in the sky.
interesting points: The objects were approximately 20 feet in diameter and were observed at an estimated altitude of 5,000 to 7,000 feet., Witnesses stated that the objects remained stationary for about 10 minutes before fading from view., The weather conditions during the sighting were clear with visibility of 15 miles., The incident involved multiple witnesses working on a ranch when they noticed the objects., Mrs. M. reported observing a metallic, oval-shaped object moving slowly across the sky on October 24, 1968.
sighted object: two disc-shaped objects, silvery-white in color
witness description: James C. Smith and Allen L. Barnes, who were working on a ranch
